description: Forms at the end of a downtrend with a megaphone shape of higher highs and lower lows.
volume: Diminishes through the pattern until breakout.
confirmation: Close above upper trend-line on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure from highest high to lowest low and add to the highest high.

description: Occurs in an uptrend forming a U-shaped cup with a handle.
volume: High at left lip, drops at the bottom, rises toward right lip and breakout.
confirmation: Close above upper trend-line on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure from right lip to bottom of cup and add to right lip level.

description: Three-peak formation with a higher center peak. Neckline drawn across intervening lows.
volume: High into the first peak, balanced at head, expands on breakout below neckline.
confirmation: Close below neckline with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure from the first low to the high of the head, subtract from neckline.

description: Short downward-sloping channel after a sharp upward move.
volume: Declines during formation, expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above upper trend-line on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure previous steep move and add to breakout level.

description: Equal highs and rising lows forming a triangle. Typically breaks out 2/3 to 3/4 of the way to the apex.
volume: Declines throughout formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above highs on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Subtract lowest low from highest high and add to breakout level.

description: Equal lows and falling highs forming a triangle. Typically breaks out 2/3 to 3/4 of the way to the apex.
volume: Declines throughout formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close below lows on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Subtract lowest low from highest high and subtract from breakout level.

description: Lower highs and higher lows forming a triangle. Can breakout in either direction.
volume: Declines throughout formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above or below converging trendlines on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Subtract lowest low from highest high and add or subtract from breakout depending on direction.

description: Three equal lows with horizontal resistance breakout.
volume: Drifts downward during formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above upper trend-line across intervening highs with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure distance between high and lows and add to breakout level.

description: Three equal highs with horizontal support breakdown.
volume: Drifts downward during formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close below lower trend-line across intervening lows with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure distance between low and highs and subtract from breakout level.

description: Lower highs and lower lows within converging trendlines in a downtrend.
volume: Declines throughout formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above upper descending trendline with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Target is the highest high of the formation.

description: Higher highs and higher lows within converging trendlines in an uptrend.
volume: Declines throughout formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close below lower ascending trendline with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Target is the lowest low of the formation.

description: Concave-shaped pattern indicating a base with gradual recovery.
volume: Mirrors price pattern and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above lip of the rounding bottom with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Subtract lowest low from highest high and add to breakout level.

description: Convex-shaped pattern indicating a top with gradual decline.
volume: Forms a U-shape and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close below lip of rounding top with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Subtract lowest low from highest high and subtract from breakout level.

description: Three-valley pattern with center low lower than shoulders. Indicates reversal to the upside.
volume: High at left shoulder, balanced at head, expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above neckline with above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure from first high to head low and add to neckline.

volume: Declines through formation and expands on breakout.
confirmation: Close above high between bottoms on above average volume.
measuring_technique: Measure from high to bottoms and add to breakout level.
